mcq.statement: As per Article 40 of the Constitution of Pakistan, the State shall endeavor to ______ based on Islamic unity, support the common interests of the People of Asia, Africa and Latin America, promote International Peace and Security, foster among all nations and encourage the settlement of international disputes by peaceful means.

options.a: Be an active part of Islamic cohesion among Muslim countries
options.b: Be as much closer to Muslim countries
options.c: Preserve and strengthen fraternal relations among Muslim countries
